game.title: Terraria
game.description: A 2D, enclosed, blocky sandbox game where you explore and fight a mass amount of bosses

game.title: Minecraft
game.description: A 3D, massive open-world, blocky sandbox game where you craft and build

game.title: Cult of the Lamb
game.description: A cult-building simulator where you play as a lamb/goat and spend days upon days building a cult from scratch
